file_content.text: Oh, you cheating little--ah! The Nikto said you were good. But I'm still their savior.
When I'm gone, they'll sing the Death Song of Thre'shalu. What do you say to that?
I am the Hand of Darth Jadus. I speak in his name, and I recognize your power. There is a place for you in the Empire.
Ever consider becoming Sith?
The Hand of Jadus. Really. Is that why you came here?
You're strong, ambitious and you have no loyalty to the Republic. There's a place for you in the Empire.
Ever consider becoming Sith?
Ha! Are you--is that why you came all this way?
To stop me and then recruit me when I'm down?
Give me the Ultrawave Transmitter, and the Sith might not kill you on sight.
Join me or die.
You hunt me like you want me, destroy everything I have, all so you can recruit me when I'm down?
Your position among the Sith would be secure. The only price I ask is the Ultrawave Transmitter.
We can both get what we want.
Don't tell me you aren't flattered.
[Flirt] You're enjoying it.
I didn't say that.
You're not like a lot of men. The Nikto are too devoted, the other Jedi are too boring...
Watch the hands.
Sir? You should be careful.
I've got to say, you've earned my respect.
Earn respect for yourself. All you have to give us is the Ultrawave Transmitter.
Join us.
My ticket to freedom. I could live with being called "Lord Sazen."
It sounds like we have an agreement. You get to be big, bad and powerful, I get the Ultrawave Transmitter... shall we celebrate?
[Flirt] Let's seal the deal.
We shall. Your little friend can wait outside.
I think we shall.
Just because she's a Jedi doesn't mean you can't catch something. You know that, right?
You really should've just shot her.
Is this always how you make alliances?
Maybe you can call me once I'm confirmed as Darth Sazen.
The Nikto will retrieve your payment. But I need to go, before the Republic comes to see what all the fuss is about.
You really are desperate for approval.
This is pathetic.
I don't need you!
Don't flatter yourself. The Nikto are more dangerous than you.
Actually, you're worthless.
Then I hope they do what I can't.
It doesn't have to be this way. You can still go back to the Republic.
You can still redeem yourself.
Ha! If they knew what I'd done... I ruined treaties. I let my Master die. They'd lock me up forever.
Maybe the Jedi can't forgive you. But the SIS needs everyone it can get.
Then join the SIS.
You're serious? You're not even on my side.
I'm a Jedi. I don't want to be a spy.
You made mistakes. Now it's time to acknowledge that.
It's the only way.
I know how you feel.
All right. But I'm still the hero of Tas-La. I'll be back for the Nikto some day.
No time for second thoughts.
I can still die the way I lived!
The authorities won't be happy, but the Jedi Order is merciful.
The Jedi will forgive you.
You really don't know the Jedi, do you?
You don't have much of a choice. You can't defeat me.
Would you rather die now?
No. Guess I can't.
You were a savior. Now you're a martyr.
Goodbye, Ki Sazen. [Kill her]
Cripes. When Jedi go nuts, they don't kid around.
We wonder what'll become of the Nikto now.
They always said Jedi were unstable, but... is that what the Force does to people?
Rakghoul! Escaped!
How invigorating.
Cipher! I hope you don't mind that I freed myself. I wanted the chance to look through Ki Sazen's research.
I think you owe me an explanation.
You're a rakghoul?
Indeed. But one thing first:
Not one move, or I put a blaster bolt in your skull.
Stay where you are.
I assure you, I am no threat.
You tried to play me from the beginning. Now I'm out of patience.
No more lies, doctor!
Yes... I was hoping to smooth things over by recovering the Ultrawave Transmitter for you, but you clearly didn't need the help.
Everything I've done has been to your benefit.
While I was examining Ki Sazen's laboratory, I found this--the Ultrawave Transmitter. It's all yours.
What the hell are you?
Your scent is purely human. How?
What are you?
You're understandably suspicious. As soon as we distance ourselves from the Republic army, I promise to answer all your questions.
We'll meet back at base.
I let you go now, you might slip away.
Can I trust you?
Contact the military. Cordon off the planet. I want to speak with you as much as you want to speak with me.
No more delays, doctor. Explain.
You'll answer me now.
The short version, then. Yes--I used you to gather data on the rakghouls. Ki Sazen was collecting research, you were after Ki Sazen.
And as you've seen, I'm using this data for a side project. I find the rakghoul virus... bracing.
Get a team in! Something's going on.
That would be the Republic. May we reconvene later?
Rendezvous at the Imperial Command center. And don't get killed on the way.
Agreed.
I'll do my very best.
If you disappear, I will hunt you down.
Don't betray me.
I believe you. I'll see you back at base.
That's for lying.
Fine, but... [Hit him]
Ah. Fair enough. I'll see you back at base.
Hey! If we kill her, can I have a lightsaber?
The Song of the Universe becomes cacophonous. Be wary.
I think that's the Jedi, sir. I don't know if my powers will work here.
Funny. When the Nikto said a girl was coming after me, I thought she'd be a challenge.
Funny. When the Nikto said someone was after me, I figured he'd be smart enough to keep his distance.
Ki Sazen. You stole the Ultrawave Transmitter. I want it back.
You have what I want.
We have a lot to discuss. Shall we do it without the weapons?
There's no need for violence.
And when I heard a Jedi was leading a Nikto cult, I thought she'd be older than twelve.
Cocky, aren't you?
It is her. She who killed my brothers!
It is he. The one who killed my brothers!
Easy, Fhentar.
I'm not turning over the Godera device. I'm going to use it to control the rakghoul colonies and then take over Taris.
We don't have anything to discuss. I'm on the verge of taking over this sorry planet.
We can call each other names, but I'm about to become ruler of all Taris.
And then, when I own this place, I'll take my cult and my rakghouls and make a nasty little paradise for anyone who swears loyalty.
You want to rule a world?
What? Why?
It's my destiny. You wouldn't understand--but then, neither does the Republic.
I thought Jedi were supposed to be passionless.
This can't be how Jedi act.
I tried that. It bored me.
You're insane. And soon you'll be dead.
Guess I have to kill you.
So overconfident.
Mistress Sazen! The scientist is gone. I can't reach any of the guards!
Not now!
I am going to deal with you. I am going to kill you. And then back to business!
You can't stand against me. No one can.
